Page Contents

    Product Release Notes

    Below are this quarter's product updates.

    Index of all product release notes

    Tips:
    • If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Product Updates document.

    Video Cloud

    Feature: Major new release of AEM connector

    Product Area: CMS Connectors

    Date: 16-September-2022

    Description: Major new release for both on-premise and cloud-based AEM connector. New features include support for labels, clips, sub-folders, video scheduling, and playlist creation in AEM.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Ingest video transcripts

    Product Area: Dynamic Ingest API, Transcripts

    Date: 9-September-2022

    Description: Ingest transcripts for your videos.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: New release with support for several additional video features

    Product Area: CMS Connectors

    Date: 9-September-2022

    Description: New major release with several added features

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Gallery now offers a Virtual Event template

    Product Area: Gallery

    Date: 29-July-2022

    Description: Complete set of Gallery Virtual Event Documentation

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Image API

    Product Area: Platform APIs

    Date: 22-July-2022

    Description: The Image API allows you to retrieve a resized, cropped, or rotated version of an image. Open to Beacon customers as well as Video Cloud.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Players, Experiences, Multi-lingual Metadata

    Product Area: Sitecore Connector

    Date: 22-July-2022

    Description: Major new features including working with in-page experiences and players in Sitecore, and support for multi-lingual variants for video metadata

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Video Transcripts

    Product Area: CMS API, Playback API

    Date: 15-July-2022

    Description: New transcript file generated during auto-captioning and added to videos

    Go to Documentation

    Brightcove Player

    Feature: Add a bumper before content video playback

    Product Area: Playback

    Date: 2-September-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to implement bumper videos, that is videos that play before the main content video.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Implementation of Short Manifest TTL

    Product Area: Content Protection

    Date: 1-July-2022

    Description: Short Manifest TTL feature information added

    Go to Documentation

    Brightcove Interactivity

    Device SDKs

    Feature: iOS SDK support for iOS 16

    Product Area: Native SDK for iOS

    Date: 16-September-2022

    Description: Native SDK for iOS support for iOS 16

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Android SDK release 7.1.1

    Product Area: Native SDK for Android

    Date: 2-September-2022

    Description: Native SDK for Android release 7.1.1

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Android SDK release 7.1.0

    Product Area: Native SDKs for Android

    Date: 26-August-2022

    Description: Android SDK release 7.1.0

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: iOS/tvOS SDK release 6.10.6

    Product Area: Native SDK for iOS

    Date: 8-July-2022

    Description: Native SDK for iOS/tvOS release 6.10.6

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Android SDK release 7.0.1

    Product Area: Native SDKs for Android

    Date: 8-July-2022

    Description: Android SDK release 7.0.1

    Go to Documentation

    Live

    Feature: Low latency streaming

    Product Area: Live Streaming

    Date: 19-August-2022

    Description: Added fields for low latency

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Low Latency streaming now available in the Live module

    Product Area: Live module

    Date: 19-August-2022

    Description: Added information on using low latency streaming

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Audio-only live streams

    Product Area: Audio only

    Date: 29-July-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create audio-only live streams.

    Go to Documentation

    Beacon

    Feature: Page layout redirects to web page

    Product Area: Managing Pages

    Date: 16-September-2022

    Description: Added new page layout Redirect

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Role-Based Access Control in Beacon Studio

    Product Area: Role-Based Access Control

    Date: 9-September-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to present content to viewers based on their assigned roles. You will manage roles in your external VMS and Brightcove Beacon Studio

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Pages as playlist assets

    Product Area: Managing Pages

    Date: 2-September-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create secondary pages and add them to playlists. This gives you the option to have an asset in a playlist that when clicked shows a new page.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Basics of secondary pages

    Product Area: Managing Pages

    Date: 2-September-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create, delete and edit secondary pages.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: SEO and search across platforms

    Product Area: Managing Pages

    Date: 2-September-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use templates and jobs to generate data reports needed for various platforms search implementations.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Using secondary pages as view all pages

    Product Area: Managing Pages

    Date: 2-September-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create, delete and edit default and custom view all pages. A view all page is used when the number of videos in a carousel meets a maximum threshold. When the threshold is exceeded, a View All link is displayed and when the link is clicked by the customer a new page appears displaying all videos, for instance in a grid.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Creating TVOD plans in Beacon Classic

    Product Area: Monetization

    Date: 26-August-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create a TVOD monetization package.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Assigning TVOD plans in Beacon Studio and Beacon Classic

    Product Area: Monetization

    Date: 26-August-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to assign a TVOD monetization package to media content.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Demo apps for customer testing

    Product Area: Apps

    Date: 12-August-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to access demo apps that have been setup for testing.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Roles as Rights in Beacon CMS

    Product Area: Roles as Rights

    Date: 15-July-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to present content to viewers based on their assigned roles. You will manage roles in your external VMS and the Brightcove Beacon CMS.

    Go to Documentation

    Feature: Stripe custom metadata

    Product Area: Monetization

    Date: 8-July-2022

    Description: In this topic, you will learn how to retrieve subscription information associated with Stripe custom metadata using the Stripe API.

    Go to Documentation
